data.title: Verisign is a global provider of domain name registry services and internet infrastructure
data.meta_description: Verisign enables the security, stability and resiliency of key internet infrastructure and services, including the .com and .net domains. The domains that define the internet are Powered by Verisign.
data.text:
Verisign enables the world to connect online with reliability and confidence - anytime, anywhere.

WHO WE ARE

A leader in domain name registry services and internet infrastructure.

Top-Level Domains

Verisign powers the domains that define the internet.

Discover Our Products

Internet Infrastructure

Verisign enables the security, stability and resiliency of internet infrastructure.

Explore Our Capabilities

INNOVATION

How we’re helping to shape the future of the internet.
